entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain showers beginning this evening then changing to periods of freezing rain before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
